name: Butterfly
text: 0:0, nourish 1 (The next card you resolve is worth 1 more point)

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Beehive
text: 2:0, swarm 3 (After your next draw step, create 3 ${126} in your hand)

name: Stable
text: 3:3, store the top card of your discard pile in this card. This card's effect becomes to add one of the stored card to your hand.

name: Honey
text: 4:X, swarm X, where X is the number of rounds you have won

name: Beekeep
text: 5:5, store all 0-cost cards in your discard pile in this card. This card's effect becomes to add them back to your discard pile.

name: Foundry
text: 5:5-X, Build X, where X is the number of cards in the story before this card

name: Mute
text: 1:1, restrict 1 (Your opponent can't play their leftmost unrestricted card next turn)

name: Raise Dead
text: 2:2, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck

name: Bastet
text: 2:1, this card retains all changes to points as it resolves (For example, if this card was nourished by 3, it stays a 2:4 once it is in the discard pile)

name: Fishing Boat
text:
2:0, tutor 1 3 times.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Angler
text:
4:4, visible, tutor 1.
(Search for a card that costs 1 and add it to your hand. Search order deck -> discard pile, top to bottom)

name: Desert
text:
4:0, modal:
0: +1, later cards this round are worth -2

1-2: Reset
3+: +4

name: Ifrit
text: 8:7, later cards this round are worth -1
